A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie was just okay.  Even my 12 year old wasn't impressed.  I was a die hard Star Wars fan.  I own all the movies and have read nearly all the books.  I thought the movie was a little hokey.  The fight scenes were lacking.   The posturing red nights were ridiculous and since when can a padawan jedi move an entire avalanche of stone boulders with ease.  I feel like disney is more concerned with pushing diversity and empowering women than it is in continuing the authentic Star Wars Legacy.  I wish they would have created their own story to push their agenda instead of hijacking Star Wars.
